name: Idle Gun Range: Merge n Shoot!
name_original: Idle Gun Range: Merge n Shoot!
description:
Reinvention of the classic merge game!
Merge to power-up your weaponry, then destroy the targets at the shooting range！

Easy and fun game play:
- Drag two identical guns to merge for a more powerful one
- Take your weapon to the shooting range, shoot to get the highest score

Fun Features of Idle Gun Range:
- Enjoy idle merge fun
- Unlock and build the coolest weaponry collection
- Test your shooting skill with various weapons
